stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
- Google Adwords Search Campaigns
- Dynamic Search Ads Campaigns
- Remarketing Search Campaigns
- Display Network Campaigns

* One-time campaigns setup fee $300. If you need only one campaign - request a quote.

Campaign setup includes the following:

-Separate Campaign  per category
-Ad Group structuring
-Keyword research
-Negative keyword list
-2-3 Unique Ads per Ad group (keyword)
-Ad extensions
-Search and Display network as required
-Ad scheduling if required
-A/B testing enabled
-Geo location targeting ( Advanced if required)
-Age targeting (if required)
-Bid strategy for multiple devices ( if required)
-Bid strategy for multiple audiences (if Available)


Optimisation includes the following:

- Weekly/monthly reports
- Weekly optimisation
- Keyword research
- Bid management
- Selection of landing pages
- Set up cost per clicks
- Adding/removing keywords based on performance
- Adding negative keywords
- Ad creation and testing
- Adding sitelinks, callouts, call extensions, structured snippets and other extensions.

Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
title: Google Adwords Campaign Setup and Optimisation
